lemma isShortestPath_flip_edges: assumes "Graph.E c' \<supseteq> E - edges" "Graph.E c' \<subseteq> E \<union> (prod.swap`edges)" assumes SP: "isShortestPath s p t" and EDGES_SS: "edges \<subseteq> set p" assumes P': "Graph.isPath c' s p' t" "prod.swap`edges \<inter> set p' \<noteq> {}" shows "length p + 2 \<le> length p'"
